title: Shinzo Abe takes blame for loss of trust over scandal as polls dive
text:
Shinzo Abe takes blame for loss of trust over scandal as polls dive 10:41am GMT - 01:40 
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his popularity plunging amid a cronyism scandal, takes responsibility for a loss of trust in his government but denies he or his wife had intervened in a land sale to a school operator with ties to his wife.   
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his popularity plunging amid a cronyism scandal, takes responsibility for a loss of trust in his government but denies he or his wife had intervened in a land sale to a school operator with ties to his wife.  //reut.rs/2IAEXPX
